name: Can You Escape - Holidays
description:
Can You Escape - Deluxe - Out Now!

Can You Escape saga is back with the special holidays episode.

Get ready to escape all possible locations dedicated to different holidays, solve puzzles and open doors just to have even more fun! We have prepared you 20 different holiday rooms full of brain teasers, hint and secrets. Find hidden objects, break codes and use your logic skills to reach the supreme goal - escaping!

Enough of chitchat - download the latest Can You Escape game and get the holidays season started!

Game features:
Clever puzzles!
Beautiful graphics!
Realistic rooms!
Unique story!
